title: Science and Religion Working Together: The Clergy Letter Project
description:
I speak with founder and director of the Clergy Letter Project Michael Zimmerman on this movement which includes thousands of clergy members across the United States, who are looking to support the teaching of sound science. Michael has a phd in evolutionary biology and worked in the past at Evergreen State Collage. We discuss his experience of the Evergreen Spring of 2017 as well.

Podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/Science-and-Religion-Working-Together-The-Clergy-Letter-Project-eaav2t
Visit the Clergy Letter Project here: https://www.theclergyletterproject.org
Follow Michael on twitter here: @mzclergyletter
Follow me on twitter here: @AndreaLynnLewis
Email me here: andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
